- Made payment methods more visible (Cash/Credit card)
- Revised payment to be made before a ride can be matched
- Revised 'Review rider' page to be visible in one page
- Added a check box to notify TADA that a rider has not paid for a cash ride
- Revised NRIC to be compulsory on driver application

- Bug that made the app crash when there wasn't a car picture in the driver document field has been fixed.
- Now the rider has to pay for the ride when they have been matched with a driver (for credit card orders only) and so, a pop up message will be shown when a payment is being made before the ride.
- Other bugs fixed

- Bug that made the app crash when there wasn't a car picture in the driver document field has been fixed.
- Now the rider has to pay for the ride when they have been matched with a driver (for credit card orders only) and so, a pop up message will be shown when a payment is being made before the ride.
- Other bugs fixed

- Modified the start day of weekly sales chart from Sunday to Monday
- Increased the size of the slider which was for changing status of current order.

- If a fare that exceeds 100 SGD is added, it will automatically divide the number by 100. (E.g. 150 -> 1.5 SGD will be inserted)
- If an already subscribed user tries to authenticate his mobile number, an error message will be displayed.
- Private-hire drivers can now request for car change in the app.
- Fixed a bug that caused the current order window to appear twice when accepted.
- Other bugs fixed.
